title: Winter Market at the Harbour
description: Local makers and producers gather at the harbour for our weekly winter market. Fresh produce, handmade crafts, vintage finds, and hot food stalls. Wrap up warm and support local!

title: Quiz Night
description: Weekly quiz with a mix of general knowledge, music rounds, and picture rounds. Teams of up to 6, £2 per person entry. Winner takes the pot!

title: Live Jazz Night
description: The Resident Trio play every Thursday evening. No cover charge, just grab a pint and enjoy. A Whitstable tradition.

title: Watercolour Painting Workshop
description: Learn coastal watercolour techniques with local artist Jenny Mitchell. All materials provided. Beginners welcome. Book in advance — limited to 8 participants.

title: Sunday Market
description: Our regular Sunday market at the harbour. Fresh veg, baked goods, artisan cheese, crafts, and vintage bits. Perfect for a weekend browse.

title: Cheese Tasting Evening
description: Join us for a guided tasting of six British artisan cheeses paired with wines. Learn about cheesemaking and discover new favourites. Booking essential.

title: Book Club: January Pick
description: Monthly book club meeting. This month we're discussing 'The Essex Serpent' by Sarah Perry. New members welcome — just pick up a copy and join us!

title: Live Jazz Night
description: The Resident Trio play every Thursday evening. No cover charge, just grab a pint and enjoy.

title: Saturday Harbour Market
description: Our biggest market day. Over 40 stalls selling local produce, street food, crafts, vintage clothing, and more. Arrive early for parking!

title: Brewery Tour & Tasting
description: Go behind the scenes at Whitstable Brewery. See how our beers are made and sample the full range. Tours last approximately 90 minutes. Booking required.

title: Coastal Photography Walk
description: Join photographer Chris Adams for a guided walk along the coast, learning techniques for capturing seascapes and beach scenes. Bring your own camera.

title: Sunday Roast Special
description: Our legendary Sunday roast with all the trimmings. Booking recommended but walk-ins welcome if we have space. Kids eat half price.

title: Wine Tasting: Natural Wines
description: Explore the world of natural wines with our sommelier. Six wines, paired with small plates from our kitchen. Booking essential.

title: Quiz Night
description: Weekly quiz with general knowledge, music, and picture rounds. Teams of up to 6, £2 per person entry.

title: Live Jazz Night
description: The Resident Trio play every Thursday evening. No cover charge.

title: Ceramics Workshop: Pinch Pots
description: Beginner-friendly ceramics workshop. Learn to make pinch pots and simple vessels. All materials included. Take your finished piece home after firing.

title: Saturday Harbour Market
description: Weekly harbour market with local produce, crafts, and street food.

title: Burns Night Supper
description: Celebrate Burns Night with haggis, neeps, tatties, and a wee dram. Live poetry readings and Scottish folk music. Booking essential.

title: Children's Storytime
description: Free storytime session for children aged 3-7. This week: seaside adventure stories! Parents welcome to stay.

title: Sunday Harbour Market
description: Sunday market at the harbour. Slightly smaller than Saturday but still plenty to see.

title: Tap Takeover: Burning Sky
description: East Sussex's Burning Sky Brewery takes over our taps for the night. Eight exclusive beers. Meet the brewer from 6pm.

title: Valentine's Tasting Menu
description: Special five-course tasting menu for Valentine's weekend. Champagne reception, wine pairings available. Book now — limited tables.

title: Oyster Shucking Masterclass
description: Learn to shuck oysters like a pro with our head chef. Includes a dozen oysters to take home and a glass of champagne.

title: Acoustic Night
description: Local singer-songwriters showcase. Three acts, intimate setting, great atmosphere. Free entry.

title: Art Exhibition Opening: Coastal Light
description: Private view for new exhibition featuring five local artists exploring light on the Kent coast. Wine and nibbles. All welcome.

title: Pancake Day Special
description: It's Shrove Tuesday! Pop in for our special pancake menu — sweet and savoury options. No booking needed.

title: Half Term Craft Workshop
description: Keep the kids busy during half term! Drop-in craft sessions making seaside-themed creations. All ages welcome, £5 per child.

title: Half Term Beach Clean
description: Family-friendly beach clean organised by Whitstable Environment Group. All equipment provided. Hot chocolate afterwards!

title: Cupcake Decorating Class
description: Learn professional cupcake decorating techniques. All materials included, take home your creations! Suitable for ages 8+. Booking essential.

title: Monthly Farmers Market
description: Extended farmers market featuring producers from across Kent and beyond. Seasonal vegetables, meats, cheeses, preserves, and more.

title: Sourdough Bread Workshop
description: Full-day sourdough workshop. Learn to make your own starter, shape loaves, and understand fermentation. Take home your own sourdough and starter.

title: Book Club: February Pick
description: Monthly book club meeting. This month: 'Piranesi' by Susanna Clarke. New members always welcome!

title: Spring Wine Tasting
description: Welcome spring with a selection of lighter wines perfect for the season. Six wines, cheese accompaniments. Booking essential.

title: Mother's Day Afternoon Tea
description: Treat mum to a special afternoon tea. Full traditional service with sandwiches, scones, and cakes. Booking essential.

title: Spring Equinox Sunrise Walk
description: Greet the spring equinox with a guided sunrise walk along the coast. Meet at the harbour, finish with coffee at The Forge.

title: Pottery Exhibition: Local Makers
description: New exhibition showcasing contemporary ceramics by Kent-based potters. Running until April 15th. Free entry.

title: St Patrick's Day Session
description: Live Irish folk music, Guinness, and craic. No booking needed, just turn up and enjoy!

title: Spring Plant Sale
description: Local gardeners selling seedlings, plants, and garden accessories. All proceeds to Whitstable in Bloom.

title: Easter Egg Hunt
description: Family fun at the castle! Hunt for eggs in the gardens, with prizes for all. £3 per child, includes hot cross bun.

title: Sea Shanty Evening
description: Join the Whitstable Shanty Crew for a singalong evening. Song sheets provided, no experience necessary!
